story.p1: Styria is one of Europe's most fascinating gourmet regions. Gentle hills, fertile soils and a mild climate create ideal conditions for products of exceptional quality.
story.p2: Austria Imperial — Green Gold brings this tradition directly to you: Styrian Pumpkin Seed Oil with Protected Geographical Indication (PGI) and hand-selected horseradish from traditional cultivation.

kernoel.title: The Pumpkin Seed Oil
kernoel.p1: Our pumpkin seed oil comes from the Kiendler oil mill in southern Styria. Here, Styrian pumpkin seeds have been cold-pressed according to traditional methods for generations. The result: a deep green oil with an intense, nutty aroma — the "green gold" of Styria.
kernoel.p2: The EU-protected designation PGI (Protected Geographical Indication) guarantees that only oil from Styria may bear this name. Every bottle is a piece of authentic Austrian culinary culture.

kren.title: The Horseradish
kren.p1: Styrian horseradish from the Hernach family is grown using proven methods and freshly processed. Its sharp spice and full-bodied aroma make it an indispensable companion of Austrian cuisine — whether with boiled beef, on a charcuterie board, or as a refinement for sauces.

s1.title: § 1 Scope of Application
s1.p1: These General Terms and Conditions (GTC) apply to all orders placed through the online shop of Austria Imperial — Green Gold. By placing an order, you enter into a purchase contract with the association Austria Imperial Green Gold — Association for the Research of AI-Powered Marketing of Regional Specialities, represented by the board (hereinafter referred to as "Provider").
s1.p2: The GTC apply in the version valid at the time of the order. Deviating terms of the customer are not recognised unless the Provider expressly agrees to their validity in writing.
s1.p3: The association pursues charitable purposes. Product sales serve the implementation of a scientific field study on the impact of AI-generated content on the sales of regional specialities (ancillary purpose privilege pursuant to § 1 para. 2 VerG).

s2.title: § 2 Conclusion of Contract
s2.p1: The presentation of products in the online shop does not constitute a legally binding offer, but an invitation to place an order.
s2.p2: By clicking the order button, you place a binding order for the goods contained in the shopping cart. Confirmation of receipt of the order is sent immediately after submission by email (order confirmation).
s2.p3: The purchase contract is concluded when the goods are handed over to the shipping service provider.

s3.title: § 3 Prices and Shipping Costs
s3.p1: All stated prices are final prices and include the statutory value added tax where applicable. In addition, shipping costs apply, which are clearly displayed before completing the order.

s4.title: § 4 Payment
s4.p1: Payment is processed through the payment service provider Stripe. The following payment methods are available: credit card (Visa, Mastercard), SEPA direct debit and other payment methods offered by Stripe.
s4.p2: The invoice amount is charged upon receipt of the order.

s5.title: § 5 Delivery
s5.p1: Delivery is made directly by our producers to the delivery address specified by the customer. For orders with products from different producers, delivery may be made in multiple packages.
s5.p2: The delivery time is usually 3–7 business days within the EU. For deliveries outside the EU, longer delivery times and additional customs duties may apply.

s6.title: § 6 Retention of Title
s6.p1: The delivered goods remain the property of the association until the purchase price has been paid in full.

s7.title: § 7 Warranty
s7.p1: The statutory warranty rights under Austrian Civil Code (ABGB) and Consumer Protection Act (KSchG) apply. Food products are excluded from exchange, provided they were delivered without defects and as described.
s7.p2: Please inspect the goods immediately upon delivery for recognisable defects. We accept complaints by email.

s8.title: § 8 Liability
s8.p1: The association is liable for damages only in cases of intent and gross negligence. In cases of slight negligence, the association is only liable for breach of essential contractual obligations. Liability is limited to the foreseeable damage typical for the contract.

s9.title: § 9 Right of Withdrawal
s9.p1: Consumers are entitled to a statutory right of withdrawal pursuant to the Austrian Distance and Off-Premises Contracts Act (FAGG) and the Consumer Protection Act (KSchG). Please refer to our cancellation policy for details.

s10.title: § 10 Applicable Law
s10.p1: The law of the Republic of Austria applies, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods. For consumers within the EU, the mandatory consumer protection provisions of their country of residence remain unaffected.

s11.title: § 11 Final Provisions
s11.p1: Should individual provisions of these GTC be or become invalid, the validity of the remaining provisions shall remain unaffected.

s1.title: 1. Privacy at a Glance
s1.generalText: The following notices provide a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you.
s1.collectionText1: Data processing on this website is carried out by the association Austria Imperial Green Gold — Association for the Research of AI-Powered Marketing of Regional Specialities. Contact details can be found in the legal notice of this website.
s1.collectionText2: Your data is collected in part by you providing it to us (e.g. in an order form). Other data is collected automatically or with your consent when you visit the website by our IT systems. This is primarily technical data (e.g. internet browser, operating system or time of page access).

s2.title: 2. Responsible Body
s2.legalName: Association for the Research of AI-Powered Marketing of Regional Specialities
s2.zvr: ZVR Number: [to be entered after registration]
s2.address:
Registered seat: Austria
[Address to be added after registration]
s2.text: The responsible body is the natural or legal person who alone or jointly with others decides on the purposes and means of the processing of personal data.

s3.title: 3. Data Processor
s3.text1: The association uses Auryx AI LLC as a data processor pursuant to Art. 28 GDPR for the operation of technical infrastructure (content engine, automation, hosting).
s3.text2: A data processing agreement (DPA) between the association and Auryx AI LLC governs the GDPR-compliant processing.
s3.auryx: Auryx AI LLC, 30 N Gould St Ste N, Sheridan, WY 82801, USA

s4.title: 4. Your Rights
s4.intro: You have the right at any time to:
rights: Obtain information about your stored personal data (Art. 15 GDPR)
Request correction of inaccurate data (Art. 16 GDPR)
Request deletion of your data (Art. 17 GDPR)
Revoke a given consent at any time (Art. 7 para. 3 GDPR)
Lodge a complaint with the Austrian Data Protection Authority (dsb.gv.at)
s4.outro: For this purpose and for any further questions regarding data protection, you can contact us at any time.

s5.title: 5. Data Collection on This Website
s5.serverLogsText1: The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us. These are: browser type and version, operating system used, referrer URL, hostname of the accessing computer, time of the server request and IP address.
s5.serverLogsText2: This data is not merged with other data sources. The basis for data processing is Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in technical provision).
s5.cookiesText: This website does not use tracking cookies. We only use technically necessary cookies that are required for the operation of the site (e.g. shopping cart, session). Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR.

s6.title: 6. Orders and Payment Processing
s6.text1: When you order from us, we collect the following data: name, email address, delivery address, billing address and order details. This data is required for contract fulfilment (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR).
s6.text2: Payment processing is carried out by Stripe, Inc. (354 Oyster Point Blvd, South San Francisco, CA 94080, USA). We do not receive complete payment data from Stripe (e.g. credit card numbers). Stripe processes your payment data in accordance with their privacy policy:

s7.title: 7. Data in the Context of the Field Study
s7.text1: The association conducts a scientific field study to research how AI-generated content influences the sales of regional specialities in international markets.
s7.text2: As part of this study, purchase data is anonymised and evaluated in aggregate form. No personal data is published in study reports. The evaluation is based exclusively on aggregated, non-traceable metrics (e.g. total revenue, number of orders, average order value per market).
s7.text3: Legal basis: Legitimate interest of the association in carrying out its statutory research activities (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR). For optional surveys (post-purchase survey), we obtain your explicit consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR).
s7.text4: You may object to the use of your anonymised purchase data for research purposes at any time by contacting us via email.

s8.title: 8. Disclosure to Third Parties
s8.text1: Your data is passed on to our fulfilment partners (producers) to the extent necessary for contract fulfilment (delivery). This includes: name, delivery address and order details.
s8.text2: In addition, data is shared with the data processor Auryx AI LLC (see Section 3) for technical processing.
s8.text3: Beyond this, no disclosure to third parties takes place unless we are legally obliged to do so.

s9.title: 9. Data Storage and Deletion Concept
s9.text1: Order data is stored for the duration of the statutory retention periods (7 years pursuant to § 132 BAO — Austrian Federal Fiscal Code).
s9.text2: Data of prospective customers (e.g. newsletter, contact form) is deleted after 2 years of inactivity.
s9.text3: Data of study participants (optional surveys) is fully anonymised after completion of the study.
s9.text4: After expiry of the respective retention periods, personal data is deleted or irreversibly anonymised.

s10.title: 10. SSL/TLS Encryption
s10.text: This site uses SSL or TLS encryption for security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content. You can recognise an encrypted connection by the fact that the address bar of the browser changes from "http://" to "https://".

s7.title: EU Dispute Resolution
s7.text1: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS):
s7.text2: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration body.

s8.title: Liability for Content
s8.text: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general laws pursuant to § 16 ECG. Pursuant to §§ 13 to 17 ECG, however, we as a service provider are not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.

s9.title: Liability for Links
s9.text: Our website contains links to external websites of third parties over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this third-party content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.

s10.title: Copyright
s10.text: The content and works created by the association on these pages are subject to Austrian copyright law. Reproduction, processing, distribution and any type of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the association.

s11.title: Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
s11.text: Austrian law applies. Place of jurisdiction is [to be added after registration].

s1.title: Right of Cancellation
s1.p1: You have the right to cancel this contract within fourteen days without giving any reason.
s1.p2: The cancellation period is fourteen days from the day on which you or a third party named by you, who is not the carrier, has taken possession of the goods.
s1.p3: To exercise your right of cancellation, you must inform us by means of a clear statement (e.g. by email) of your decision to cancel this contract:
s1.contact:
Austria Imperial Green Gold — Association for the Research of AI-Powered Marketing of Regional Specialities
Email: info@austriaimperial.com
s1.p4: To meet the cancellation deadline, it is sufficient for you to send the notification of the exercise of the right of cancellation before the cancellation period expires.

s2.title: Consequences of Cancellation
s2.p1: If you cancel this contract, we shall reimburse to you all payments received from you, including the costs of delivery (with the exception of the supplementary costs resulting from your choice of a type of delivery other than the least expensive type of standard delivery offered by us), without undue delay and in any event not later than fourteen days from the day on which we are informed about your decision to cancel this contract.
s2.p2: We will use the same means of payment as you used for the original transaction, unless you have expressly agreed otherwise. In no case will you be charged any fees because of such reimbursement.
s2.p3: We may withhold reimbursement until we have received the goods back or you have supplied evidence of having sent back the goods, whichever is the earliest.

s3.title: Return Shipment
s3.p1: You shall send back the goods without undue delay and in any event not later than fourteen days from the day on which you communicate your cancellation from this contract to us. The deadline is met if you send back the goods before the period of fourteen days has expired.
s3.p2: You will bear the direct cost of returning the goods.

s4.title: Exclusion of the Right of Cancellation
s4.p1: The right of cancellation does not exist for contracts for the delivery of goods which can spoil quickly or whose expiry date would be quickly exceeded.
s4.p2: The right of cancellation expires for contracts for the delivery of sealed goods which are not suitable for return for reasons of health protection or hygiene if their seal has been removed after delivery.
s4.p3: For food products (pumpkin seed oil, horseradish), the right of cancellation is excluded once the seal of the bottle/jar has been opened.

s5.title: Model Cancellation Form
s5.intro: If you want to cancel the contract, please fill out this form and send it back:
s5.to: To: Austria Imperial Green Gold — Association for the Research of AI-Powered Marketing of Regional Specialities, info@austriaimperial.com
s5.body: I/We (*) hereby cancel the contract concluded by me/us (*) for the purchase of the following goods:
